XMLDB.COMMENT: The plugin allows to manage various policy documents that users have to accept to use the site.

TABLE.NAME: tool_policy
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains the list of policy documents defined on the site.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the order in which policies should be presented to users

FIELD.NAME: currentversionid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the current policy version that applies on the site, NULL if the policy does not apply

TABLE.NAME: tool_policy_versions
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds versions of the policy documents

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the policy document

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of the policy: 0 - Site policy, 1 - Privacy policy, 2 - Third party policy, 99 - Other

FIELD.NAME: audience
FIELD.COMMENT: Who is this policy targeted at: 0 - all users, 1 - logged in users only, 2 - guests only

FIELD.NAME: archived
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the version be considered as archived. All non-archived, non-current versions are considered to be drafts.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who last edited this policy document version.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the policy version was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the policy version was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: policyid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the policy document we are version of.

FIELD.NAME: revision
FIELD.COMMENT: Human readable version of the policy document

FIELD.NAME: summary
FIELD.COMMENT: Policy text summary

FIELD.NAME: summaryformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the summary field

FIELD.NAME: content
FIELD.COMMENT: Full policy text

FIELD.NAME: contentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the content field

TABLE.NAME: tool_policy_acceptances
TABLE.COMMENT: Tracks users accepting the policy versions

FIELD.NAME: policyversionid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the policy document version

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user this acceptance is relevant to

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Acceptance status: 1 - accepted, 0 - not accepted

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: Code of the language the user had when the policy document was displayed

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who last modified the acceptance record

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the acceptance record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the acceptance record was last modified

FIELD.NAME: note
FIELD.COMMENT: Plain text note describing how the actual consent has been obtained if the policy has been accepted on other user's behalf.

KEY.NAME: uq_versionuser
KEY.COMMENT: There cannot exist more records for given user and policy document version.
